positions.title: Imperial College London
positions.subtitle: PhD: Controlled Quantum Dynamics
comments: Student in controlled quantum dynamics centre for doctoral training
Graded “distinction” in master’s year
Designing and microfabricating a chip trap for robust containment and control of cold molecules
Applications in quantum technology, thermodynamics and communications

positions.title: University of Oxford
positions.subtitle: Master of Physics
comments: Master of Physics, Upper Second Class Honours, integrated master’s and undergraduate degrees
Master’s project: use of compressed sensing in plasma wakefield accelerators

positions.title: Superconducting qubits, Department of Physics, Unviersity of Oxford
comments: Simulated and developed signal attenuator for use in experiments with superconducting qubits
Eight week summer placement in Prof. Peter Leek's research group.

positions.title: Unconventional computing, YCCSA, University of York
comments: Undertook research into novel forms of classical computation using nuclear magnetic resonance
Utilised this well-understood “sandbox” environment to implement systems with continuous logic

positions.title: Oxford University Rowing Clubs Website
comments: Began and lead development of a new CMS-based website as coordinator of small team
Integrated with an existing system for handling entries into rowing events
Also responsible for deployment and server maintenance

positions.title: Qiskit contributor
comments: Contributor to open source project
Qiskit is a toolkit for interacting with quantum processors, procuced by IBM.

positions.title: Python lab demonstrating, Imperial College London
comments: Demonstrator in Python course for second year physics undergraduates
Teaching basics of object-oriented programming

positions.title: President, Corpus Christi College Boat Club
comments: Responsibility for equimpent, safety and general running of the club
Set out plans for long-term financial security by working with alumni and rasing profile to attract potential sponsors

positions.title: Treasurer, Oxford University Alternative Pickup Ice Hockey Club
comments: Ran ice hockey sessions including collecting payment and ensuring safety
Reduced financial defecit by approximately 80%, by focusing heavily on recruitment
